q: Discipline is choosing what you want most over what you want now.
Small steps daily become massive results.
Earn your confidence one rep at a time.
Focus on the next set. The rest takes care of itself.
You don’t rise to the occasion—you fall to your standards.
Form first. Intensity second. Consistency always.
If it’s hard, you’re in the right place—stay there.
Make it ugly if you must—just make it happen.
